content: जामि {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [जम्-इन् नि° वृद्धिः] {@--1@} Customary, usual. {@--2@} Peculiar, or belonging to. --मिः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} {@--1@} A sister. {@--2@} A daughter. {@--3@} A daughter-in-law. {@--4@} A near female relative ( सन्निहितसपिंडस्त्री <ls>Kull.</ls>); <ls>Ms. 3. 57-58</ls>. {@--5@} A virtuous and respectable woman. {@--6@} <ab>Ved.</ab> A finger. {@--7@} Water. {%--<ab>n.</ab>%} {@--1@} Blood-relationship, relation of sister and brother. {@--2@} Relation (in general), descent. {@--3@} Tautology.
